mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into opening_requirement_lists (requirement_setting_id, requirement_type, opening_requirements_id) values (#{requirementSettingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requirementType,jdbcType=BIT}, #{openingRequirementsId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select id, requirement_setting_id, requirement_type, opening_requirements_id from opening_requirement_lists

select orl.*, dopi.id dopi_id, dopi.name dopi_name from opening_requirement_lists orl inner join dictionary_open_private_infos dopi on orl.requirement_setting_id = dopi.id where orl.opening_requirements_id=#{param1} and orl.requirement_type=1

select orl.*, dopi.id dopi_id, dopi.name dopi_name from opening_requirement_lists orl inner join dictionary_open_private_infos dopi on orl.requirement_setting_id = dopi.id where orl.opening_requirements_id=#{param1} and orl.requirement_type=0
